title: Empire.io
author: Empire.io
created_time: September 01, 2023, 03:11:58 PMLast edit: September 04, 2023, 02:09:19 PM by Empire.io
content: [ANN] Exclusive Empire.io Promotion on Bitcoin Talk: Win 50 Free Spins on Gates of Olympus!Attention Bitcoin Talk Community! BTCWe are incredibly excited to announce a special promotion exclusively for the Bitcoin Talk community! The promotion is in collaboration with Empire.io, your go-to platform for an unparalleled online crypto-gambling experience.Date: Sunday, 02/09, 0:00 - 23:59 GMTWager: 100 USDT or its equivalent in other currenciesGame: Video slotsReward: 50 Free Spins on Gates of Olympus from Pragmatic PlayReward Time: Delivered by Monday before 18:00 GMTFree Spins winnings must be wagered 20 times within two weeks.How to ParticipateRegister/Login: If you haven't already, register or log in at www.Empire.ioNavigate to Video Slots: Head over to the video slots section.Wager 100 USDT or Equivalent: Place your bets, ensuring that your total wagering sums up to at least 100 USDT (or any currency equivalent) during the promotional period.Wait for Reward: 50 Free Spins on Gates of Olympus from Pragmatic Play will be credited to your account by Monday before 18:00 GMT.Terms & ConditionsThe promotion is valid only on 02/09 between 0:00 and 23:59 GMT.Only wagers on video slots count towards this promotion.Wagering requirement must be fulfilled in a single day.Free spins will be credited by the following Monday before 18:00 GMT.Free Spins winnings must be wagered 20 times within two weeks.Standard Empire.io terms and conditions apply.Link to Empire.io announcement thread here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5464593.0Good luck, and have an awesome weekend everyone! Â [/list]

comments.author: God Of Thunder
comments.body: Quote from: Empire.io on September 01, 2023, 03:11:58 PMReward: 50 Free Spins on Gates of Olympus from Pragmatic PlayHi Empire.ioSince your games do not pay in Bitcoin, I suggest you move your topic to the Bounties (Altcoin) board. See the rules of this board;Quote from: mprep on June 04, 2021, 12:52:59 PMGiveaways, games, raffles, airdrops and other promotional campaigns that pay out a part or all of their rewards in altcoins do not belong in Games and Rounds. Giveaways and other similar promotional campaigns that pay out in altcoins and do not require users to post in your thread / topic to participate can be be posted in Bounties (Altcoins). Make sure to read the stickied threads in the aforementioned board before you post there.
